items.sentence: Please check your valuables at the front desk.
It\'s time for you to tell me the whole truth.
I can\'t believe I didn\'t even think of that.
I\'ll phone you as soon as I arrive in Boston.
I\'ll try to jump over this stream on a horse.
I have to do my homework instead of going out.
I have to go to the airport to meet my cousin.
I need to ask Tom what to do about the matter.
I need to find a place to put all these books.
I need to practice speaking French more often.
I need you to tell me when you plan to arrive.
I never got good grades in junior high school.
Do you think Tom might be part of the problem?
I want to meet people from all over the world.
I wonder how long this good weather will last.
You\'re not laying one finger on Tom\'s money.
Is it true that Tom wasn\'t able to help Mary?
Tom deals with that kind of problem every day.
Tom decided to go ahead let Mary have her way.
My mother bought my brother a yellow umbrella.
